attributes.additional_details:
Religion has no place in politics in any form. People are free to worship on their own; it should not influence the politics of their local council.

We, the below signed, demand that any form of worship or prayer be banned from taking place at council meetings.

We do not seek a restriction on liberties, merely the abolition of religion from the realm of British politics and law.

Everyone, regardless of belief, deserves to be treated the same.

Let's make it happen; for a fairer and more just Britain.
